We have acquired IF Samad Taylor and RHP Max Castillo from the Toronto Blue Jays in exchange for IF Whit Merrifield.
 
Taylor has been assigned to Omaha (AAA), Castillo has been added to our 40-man roster and optioned to Omaha.
The Royals did right by their players and fans today. They also got a great return for Whit, I think. Could they have done more? Sure. Was this a huge piece of moving forward? Absolutely. Well done.

Salad Taylor heading from #Bluejays to #Royals in Whit Merrifield trade‚Ä¶

- Toolsy middle of field profile
- Power has improved
- Natural Batspeed
- Power/Speed Potential
